snippet.title: The Fox in the Forest digital board game trailer
snippet.description:
The Fox in the Forest is a beautifully illustrated trick-taking card game for 2 players, brought to life as a gorgeous new digital board game.

Use special abilities and take tricks to win, but don't get greedy! Win too many tricks, and you might become the villain of your fairy tale...

Lovingly adapted from the hit tabletop game from Renegade Game Studios and Foxtrot Games, The Fox in the Forest joins Dire Wolf's growing catalog of acclaimed digital board games, including Root, Sagrada, Raiders of the North Sea, and others.

www.DireWolfDigital.com
